name: Ants Or Pigs
description: Ants on a pilgrimage to build stonehenge... or Anthenge... This game doesn't really quite work.

name: Are You With Us?
description: Are you with us? Was a game discovered in the crawl space under the crawl space right under the local goodwill. The video cassette and it's manual have been lying dormant waiting for an unsuspecting soul to prey on. That day has finally arrived. Peeling open the dusty pages of what suspiciously looks like an old algebra notebook reveals dark secrets. This video and it's notebook has the last kept record of communication with the dead. It was only a matter of time until this fell into the wrong hands... Yours. Don't think this instructional video doesn't come with a price...

name: Zen Madness
description: Keep your concentration in this fast-paced distraction avoidance game.

name: Ritual Cards
description: Carl Cox and I put this game together. We made this game in Unity, but we both are beginners in unity. Our game intended to reflect some realities of Aztec rituals. Although we didn't get the game finished, the point of the game was to find card matches before the time ran out. If you didn't find your matches before time expires, then there was going to be some sort of visual that represented the constant sacrifice utilized by the Aztecs.

name: The Powers That Bee
description: The Queen bee is an idiot and sold all of the precious artifacts required to summon the Spring Goddess and end winter. Use your worker and warrior bees to gather the artifacts and bring about Spring! Hints: Warrior bees are required to kill monsters. Worker bees are required to bring artifacts back to the hive. Controls: WASD to move. Left-click on the beehive to summon a worker bee, right-click to summon a warrior bees. Away from the hive clicking releases a bee.

name: Writual
description: Throughout the ages, repeated hand gestures have been associated with various rituals in our lives. In the present day, we have an entirely new set of hand gestures that have become part of our daily lives. These gestures come in the form of taps, pinches and swipes as we interact with our mobile devices. How good at you at this modern day Writual?

name: Elementy Game
description: A reflex & color-mapping game where you must use the correct element to defeat the enemies!

name: Marty McPaper's Epic Delivery Service
description: You're about to immerse yourself into Marty's world. Where every day you're throwing papers. And smoking cigs. Like a boss. Press X to throw a paper.

name: Morning Ritual
description: Every morning we go through a delicate morning ritual to prepare ourselves for the onslaught of the day.

name: Rite of Passage
description: A puzzle platformer developed in Windows. Find your way out of the temple to prove your courage! Use the arrow keys to move, 'z' to jump, and 'x' to shoot magic (*The game is incomplete. Consider yourself a winner once you reach the white door!)
